VALUE OVER HYPE

Our conservative approach prioritizes wealth preservation and consistent returns over speculative trading. Choose the plan that aligns with your risk tolerance and investment goals.

CONSERVATIVE
6%
ANNUAL RETURN TARGET

Conservative Asset Allocation

Over 80% allocation in safe, income-generating assets including government bonds, blue-chip stocks, and established REITs.

Lower Volatility

Designed for capital preservation with steady, predictable returns suitable for conservative investors and retirement planning.

Minimum Investment

100jt IDR minimum entry, with flexible contribution options.

IDEAL FOR:

  • Risk-averse investors
  • Retirement planning
  • Capital preservation focus
  • Income generation priority
GROWTH
10%
ANNUAL RETURN TARGET

Balanced Growth Strategy

Over 60% allocation in growth-oriented assets including quality growth stocks, sector ETFs, and international exposure.

Higher Return Potential

Designed for investors seeking wealth accumulation with moderate risk tolerance and longer investment horizons.

Minimum Investment

500jt IDR minimum entry, reflecting the higher commitment level.

IDEAL FOR:

  • Growth-focused investors
  • Wealth accumulation goals
  • Moderate risk tolerance
  • Long-term horizon (5+ years)

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

What are the expected returns and how are they calculated?

Our 6% and 10% targets are based on historical performance of conservative and balanced portfolio strategies in the Indonesian market. Returns are calculated using a combination of dividend income, capital appreciation, and currency hedging strategies.

What are the risks associated with these investment plans?

All investments carry risk. The 6% plan focuses on capital preservation with lower volatility, while the 10% plan accepts moderate risk for higher return potential. We minimize risk through diversification, quality asset selection, and active management.

Can I withdraw my money before the minimum period?

We recommend a minimum commitment period to optimize returns. Early withdrawals may be subject to penalties. Please refer to our service agreement for specific terms and conditions.

How often will I receive performance reports?

All clients receive monthly performance reports and quarterly portfolio reviews. Additional communication is available upon request, and the 10% plan includes bi-weekly consultation calls.

What makes Anoa Investama different from other wealth managers?

Our Cambridge and LSE education, value investing philosophy, focus on Indonesian families, and transparent 6-step process set us apart. We prioritize long-term wealth preservation over short-term gains.
